sections.title: Verse 1
content: We bring our gifts Lord, bread and wine
We bring our gifts Lord, bread and wine
We bring our-selves, Lord, heart and Mind

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Make us one Lord, as you prayed
Make us one Lord, as you prayed
Grant us peace Lord, hear our prayer

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Let us love Lord, as you loved,
Let us love Lord, as you loved,
In this banquet Lord, we find strength:
